job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: At DealerPolicy, we're changing the way people shop for insurance through technology. We focus on collaboration, integrity, creativity and being a part of a team that finds passion and energy within our people. We strive to create autonomous product development teams aligned to solve complex technical problems needed to achieve our collective company goals. Through our "internal open-source" model it allows our engineers the ability to contribute to any aspect of the DealerPolicy Insurance Distribution Platform. We've built an award-winning product using modern technologies and have been named one the best Tech Startup in VT according to Tech Tribune, along with “Agent of the Future” award from Liberty Mutual and “Agent of the Year” from Travelers.  As an experienced at DealerPolicy you must have expert web development skills and direct experience building mobile-first and progressive web applications. You will work closely with our product and engineering team to build key product features continuously improving the experience for our customers and clients. The DealerPolicy software is built using C#, .NET core, Web API, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, React Native, Reduct, Material UI, and runs on cloud PaaS infrastructure in Azure. DealerPolicy is the most trusted and complete digital insurance marketplace for automotive retailers and their valued customers. The company’s innovative mobile technology enables car-buyers to view multiple insurance quotes and immediately connect with licensed insurance agents to purchase insurance. With an exclusive combination of partnerships among premier automotive retailers and data providers, an industry-best insurance carrier network, and access to DealerPolicy Insurance licensed agents, DealerPolicy is recognized for its place at the forefront of Insurtech. DealerPolicy Insurance is a licensed insurance agency, with licenses to operate in the lower 48 states. For more information, visit www.dealerpolicy.com.
